:::{#thm-var-lincom}

#### Variance of a linear combination

For any vector of random variables $\vX = (\Xin)$
and corresponding vector of constants $\va = (a_1, ... ,a_n)$,
the variance of their linear combination is:

$$
\ba
\Var{\va \cdot \vX}
&= \Var{\sumin a_i X_i}
\\ &= \va\' \var{\vX} \va
\\ &= \sumin \sumn{j} a_i a_j \Cov{X_i,X_j}
\ea
$$
:::
